alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:35AM EST until January 13 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun affecting Webster and McLean Counties. .Heavy rainfall and snow melt this weekend, combined with elevated water levels traveling downstream from the Green River at Rochester, will move the Green River at Calhoun back into Minor Flood stage and keep it there through the middle of this week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon, then rise to 23.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 23.1 feet and begin rising again Monday evening. It will rise to 23.8 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
